## IEquiv.equiv() method

Returns `true` if this \*value\* is equivalent to `o`<!-- -->. Also see `ICompare.compare` and `IHash.hash`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
equiv(o: any): boolean;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  o | <code>any</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`
